overview: Martin is a hermit overreacting to the covid-19 pandemic. He never goes outside and hoards toilet paper. Wanting to change his life, Martin breaks his prolonged quarantine by leaving his apartment to get a haircut. In this comedy, one discovers that getting a good haircut isn't that easy.

production_companies.name: THE END OF ART / THE END OF LOVE

title: Mr. Quarantine's Haircut
